overview:
Josh Meyer is the current co-founder of the website MiFilter.com, a blog content aggregation and recommendation service.

Previously he was the co-founder of the daily deals website DealsInME which he and his partner successfully exited less than one year from idea inception.

After the successful exit of DealsInME, Josh was retained as a consultant to Maineâ€™s largest media company to help provide direction and experience to their New Media and Web Business Group.
